text: Thought I’d drop this idea here, to see if there’s anyone else who might be interested in this idea and/or if any HS employees have any insight <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Ability-to-use-HubL-vars-with-JS-files-created-in-Design-Manager/idi-p/309399>
